title: Ip Balance Says insufficient, but isnt.

embed.description: Tinypic™ is a photo and video sharing service that allows you to easily upload, link and share your images and videos on MySpace®, eBay®, blogs and message boards. No account required, upload your photos and videos today!

body: Went to purchase vayne after collecting enough IP, but it says I cant. I disconnected and reconnected with the same issue. I haven't purchased any champs since fizz 2 days ago. HELP

replies.body:
This is a pretty rare bug that pops up in the Beta Client. You should be able to bypass this by launching into the *Legacy Client* from the login screen to complete your purchase:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this helped!
